metadata.title: CVE-2013-4362 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
WEB-DAV Linux File System (davfs2) 1.4.6 and 1.4.7 allow local users togain privileges via unknown attack vectors in (1) kernel_interface.c and(2) mount_davfs.c, related to the "system" function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4362` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

davfs2 - 1.5.4-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: davfs2 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.4-2').
